Daly_City.19th Avenue (San Francisco):
19th Avenue in San Francisco, California, is an 8 km (5 miles) long, six-lane arterial thoroughfare that bisects the southwestern part of the city.

It begins at the southern edge of Golden Gate Park in the Sunset District, as the continuation of Crossover Drive, which cuts through the park north-south. After running through the Sunset District to Sloat Boulevard, it continues south, passing Stonestown Galleria and San Francisco State University and reaches Junipero Serra Boulevard.
